movies.title: Beyond Enemy Lines
movies.plot: A movie based on real wartime diaries tells the story of the Swedish speaking Finns' infantry regiment 61. The story follows the regiment during the Continuation War from 1942 to 1944 and from Syväri to the Karelian Isthmus where they faced some of the most grueling battles against the Soviet Union.
movies.simplePlot: A story of the infantry regiment 61 that fought from Syväri to the Karelian Ishtmus.

biography.bio: Tobias Zilliacus was born on September 30, 1971 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for L'Hypnotiseur (2012), Beyond Enemy Lines (2004) and Upswing (2003). He has been married to Linda Zilliacus since 2001. They have three children.
biography.name: Tobias Zilliacus

biography.bio: Ilkka Heiskanen was born on January 11, 1962 in Hamina, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for Beyond Enemy Lines (2004), The Mercenary Soldier (1997) and Silence (2011).
biography.name: Ilkka Heiskanen

biography.bio: Christopher Weiss was born on January 27, 1978 in Karjaa, Finland. He is an actor, known for Beyond Enemy Lines (2004), Kites Over Helsinki (2001) and Killing Me Softly (2003).
biography.name: Christopher Weiss

biography.bio: Kim Gustafsson is an actor, known for Beyond Enemy Lines (2004), Chodec (2001) and Handu pumpulla (2005).
biography.name: Kim Gustafsson

biography.bio: Martin Bahne was born on April 22, 1975 in Kaarina, Finland. He is an actor, known for Frontière, 1918 (2007), Beyond Enemy Lines (2004) and Tom of Finland (2017).
biography.name: Martin Bahne

biography.bio: Carl-Gustaf Wentzel was born on October 15, 1974 in Helsinki, Finland as Carl-Gustaf Georg Wentzel. He is an actor, known for Elämä on näytelmä (1999), Beyond Enemy Lines (2004) and Les Moomins sur la Riviera (2014). He has been married to Silva Lillrank since 2001. They have one child.
biography.name: Carl-Gustaf Wentzel

biography.bio: Jan-Christian Söderholm was born on December 7, 1976 in Stockholm. He is an actor, known for Beyond Enemy Lines (2004), Apeiron (2013) and The Mist (2007).
biography.name: Jan-Christian Söderholm

biography.bio: Sampo Sarkola was born on January 31, 1978 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor, known for Things We Do for Love (2013), Apeiron (2013) and Heartbeats (2009).
biography.name: Sampo Sarkola

biography.bio: Johan Rönneholm is an actor, known for Beyond Enemy Lines (2004).
biography.name: Johan Rönneholm

biography.bio: Joachim Thibblin was born on April 11, 1975 in Espoo, Finland. He is an actor, known for Beyond Enemy Lines (2004), Inget ljus i tunneln (2011) and Hovimäki (1999).
biography.name: Joachim Thibblin

biography.bio: Oskar has lived in Finland (Helsinki, Kuusankoski, Turku, Kauniainen), Japan (Tokyo), Holland (the Hague), and England (Bubwith - North Yorkshire) and attributes any and all demented characteristics to all this moving around - and all the good education he got at the American School in Japan and the British School in the Netherlands. After getting accepted to the Rotterdam conservatory (classical guitar) he opted for the hands-on training at John Sichel's ARTTS Int foundation course in TV, thetre & film, and, later, the Helsinki Theatre Academy. Since graduating in 1997 he has worked extensively in the finno-swedish theatre as an actor and, more recently, director.
biography.name: Oskar Silén

biography.bio: Paavo Kerosuo is an actor, known for Kites Over Helsinki (2001), Les Moomins sur la Riviera (2014) and Beyond Enemy Lines (2004).
biography.name: Paavo Kerosuo

biography.bio: Patrick Henriksen was born on March 18, 1976 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for Mother of Mine (2005), Beyond Enemy Lines (2004) and Falkenswärds möbler (2000).
biography.name: Patrick Henriksen

biography.bio: Peter Kanerva is an actor, known for Colorado Avenue (2007), Inget ljus i tunneln (2011) and A Patriotic Man (2013).
biography.name: Peter Kanerva

biography.bio: Jan Korander is known for his work on The Mist (2007), Beyond Enemy Lines (2004) and The Princess of Egypt (2013).
biography.name: Jan Korander
